xyz.msws.nope.modules.npc

Class NPCModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.msws.nope.modules.AbstractModule
      • xyz.msws.nope.modules.npc.NPCModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class NPCModule
extends AbstractModule
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Responsible for managing and assigning NPCs, ideally you shouldn't be calling NPC.remove().
    Author:
    imodm

      NPC getOrSpawn(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Primary method for spawning a NPC for a player.
      boolean hasNPC(java.util.UUID player)
      Returns whether or not the player has been assigned an NPC with getOrSpawn.
      boolean isRegisteredNPC(int entityid)
      This returns true ONLY if the NPC is an NPC assigned, players can be sent NPCs without being assigned them (like with PlayerESP)
      void onQuit(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerQuitEvent event) 
      void removeNPC(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
